YiFy, I am an old downloader of your torrent files. I love how you compress 720p under 1GB and still are able to retain the quality pretty much. Not to mention the great work you do on 650 and 700MB's. Love your work. Keep it up YiFY. I will be your fan for years to come.

@ lavender gurl.....unfortunately , YIFY "soldout". The vast majority of Piratebay users have good internet bandwidth. I do not have, and i was amazed when i discovered him with excellent 500mb rips. These days his 720p films are on the average 1 GB. Chalk it down to the insatiable public

Thanks again Yify!

@Soletar, so one of the most in-demand uploaders should cater to a minority of users' needs only? Sucks that you don't have ample bandwidth, but it's a necessity if you want to download movies via torrent or any other source online. That's not YIFY's problem.

If someone has a 250GB/month bandwidth cap, guess what? They don't demand everyone to compress movie files to 500 MB so they can download 500 movies, they work within their limits and download 250 files at 1 GB a piece if that's all they can find. Work within the bandwidth you got.

Saying YIFY sold out is like saying Best Buy sold out for their DVD-only movie selection just because you have a VCR and no DVD player.

A-10
